name: Speech-F
tagline: HTML 5 Media Player with Search-Within-Video and Tagging feature
body:
### Welcome to Speech-F project.
Speech-F is a HTML5 Media player with Search-Within-Video and Tagging feature. Anybody can use Speech-F media player to upload video/audio files to their website using simple HTML snippets, to make the media content both searchable and taggable. 

### Demo
<iframe src="http://ec2-54-235-225-226.compute-1.amazonaws.com/speechf-js/demo.html" 
 	seamless=seamless width=100% height=100% ></iframe>

### Authors and Contributors
Currently Speech-F project is owned and maintained by @shiva2110 .
